## Learning Objectives

In this hands-on session, you will:

1. Set up a Google Colab notebook
2. Create a reproducible project structure
3. Load and explore the workshop dataset
4. Practice basic Python and pandas operations

## Prerequisites

- Google account with Colab access
- Completed [Computing Setup](../computing.qmd) guide

## Exercise Overview

### Part 1: Environment Setup (15 min)

- Install required packages
- Verify your setup
- Connect to Google Drive (optional)

### Part 2: Project Structure (20 min)

- Create folder structure
- Understand data organization
- Set up paths and configurations

### Part 3: Data Exploration (25 min)

- Load the supply chain dataset
- Basic data inspection
- Summary statistics
- Initial visualizations

## After This Session

You will have:

- A working Colab environment
- Understanding of reproducible project structure
- Familiarity with the workshop dataset
- Confidence in basic Python operations
